author: lwindle
title: When is FriendsFest 2017 UK tour? Tickets, Dates, venues, pre-sale info and prices – all you need to know
text:
Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments IT WAS way back in 1994 that the world was treated to the first episode of legendary American sitcom Friends. 
The ten years that followed were a decade of hilarity, laughs and loves, as legions of fans became besotted with the six chums, an ugly naked guy and a very smelly cat. 
But if you want to relive the Friends magic don’t worry because a festival dedicated to the classic show is touring the UK and if you’re quick, you can sign up to the pre-sale. Here are all the details… PA:Press Association Maggie Wheeler AKA. Janice from Friends helped launch the festival last year, Chandler would have helped but he’s still at 15 Yemen Road, Yemen What is the FriendsFest UK tour? 
Last year FriendsFest sold out, and sold out fast. 
Due to the phenomenal demand, Comedy Central UK are bringing it back and this year it’ll be bigger and better than ever. 
The festival – in partnership with The Luna Cinema – will include with brand new features like a full scale set of Joey and Chandler’s apartment, original memorabilia from the iconic show and new fan experiences. 
Last year you were able to recreate the opening sequence on the iconic orange sofa and sing Smelly Cat karaoke. 
There’s so much fun on offer, you might even get BAMBOOZLED! Getty Images Dust off that friends box set and brush up on all the classic moments from PIVOT to lobsters to ‘hands up who’s fine!’ you want want to forget a single moment ahead of FriendsFest When and where is the FriendsFest UK tour? 
FriendsFest will be hitting the road – possibly in Phoebe’s nan’s cab but we can’t confirm. 
Running from July 7 to September 24, there are plenty of opportunities to settle in with you favourite pals and immerse yourself in the (Central) Perks! Hillsborough Park, Sheffield – 7th July – 16th July Bute Park, Cardiff – 21st July – 30th July Heaton Park, Manchester – 4th August – 13th August Blenheim Palace, Oxfordshire – 18th August – 27th August Hylands House, Essex – 1st September – 10th September Clissold Park, London – 15th September – 24th September How can I get tickets to the FriendsFest UK tour and when is the pre-sale? 
Tickets will cost £26 and if you want to get your hands on some you better act fast. 
The general sale starts on Friday February 24, 2017. 
But if you were ahead of the game and signed up to the pre-sale – registration finished at midnight on February 21 – then you can access the first round of tickets TODAY from 10am. What are you waiting for?! Gunther from Friends recites theme tune in his own dour way
